'''Elmund Brushwood''' is a [[Men of Bree|man]] of [[Bree]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War in the North]]''. He is a smith, and can be found in his forge near the [[Prancing Pony]]. He has known several [[Rangers of the North|Rangers]], in particular one named Hador.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings: War in the North]], ''Prologue''</ref>
